madman noun [C]
(STRANGE/DANGEROUS MAN)

disapproving a man who behaves in a very strange and uncontrolled or dangerous way: I drove like a madman to get there in time.
madman noun [C]
(MENTALLY ILL)
old use or offensive a word for a man who has a mental illness, which was used by doctors in the past but is now offensive
